name: 31Projects
tag_list: crowdsourcing, students, projects, social-enterprises, nonprofits, entrepreneurs
overview:
31Projects works to get students & young alumni involved in putting their skills to use to help social enterprises, nonprofits, and entrepreneurs who are changing the world. The 31Projects platform connects students and organizations in two ways: through defined, short-term projects and through crowdsourcing-style contests. The projects and competitions enable students to apply their skills in business, design, communications, or technology to make an impact and provide organizations an efficient way to get the help they need.

31Projects is a for-profit social enterprise with the mission to inspire the generation of students and young alumni to get involved in helping to change the world.
